T02D1539:150a-1: sa ha dz'a mandala tri a'a lo ka sa ha dza n'a ma //
T02D1539:150a-3: lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1539:150a-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1539:150a-5: byed rgyu la sogs rnam par spangs //
T02D1539:150a-6: skye 'jig tshogs bral mi gnas pa //
T02D1539:150a-7: gnyis med he ru ka dpal la //
T02D1539:150a-8: btud de lhan cig skyes pa bri //
T02D1539:150a-9: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang //
T02D1539:150a-10: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang //
T02D1539:150a-11: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1539:150a-12: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02D1539:150a-13: ra ni me ru bstan pa ste //
T02D1539:150a-14: khrag dang mkhris pa yang dag 'byung //
T02D1539:150a-15: bad kan gyis ni khyab nas su //
T02D1539:150b-0: rdul dang rgyus pa'ang @150b 'byung ba yin //
T02D1539:150b-1: de dag gtso bo rlung yin te //
T02D1539:150b-2: ha ni kun du 'gro bar brjod //
T02D1539:150b-3: rus pa yi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D1539:150b-4: sa bon lngas ni khyab pa yin //
T02D1539:150b-5: ra ni rkan la gnas pa ste //
T02D1539:150b-6: sa bon bzhi ni bla na med //
T02D1539:150b-7: re'u mig dang po'i gnas su ni //
T02D1539:150b-8: sa bon lnga las brgyan pa ste //
T02D1539:150b-9: ha ni dbyangs yig drug pa dang //
T02D1539:150b-10: lnga pa rnams par shes par grags //
T02D1539:150b-11: ha zhes bya ba kun nas ni //
T02D1539:150b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ste //
T02D1539:150b-13: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1539:150b-14: dngos dang sngos med 'dres gyur te //
T02D1539:150b-15: bshad gci bad kan khrag dang ni //
T02D1539:150b-16: de bzhin lnga pa khu ba ste //
T02D1539:150b-17: bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin lus //
T02D1539:150b-18: rus pa rkang dang khu ba ste //
T02D1539:150b-19: pha las skyes par bstan pa yin //
T02D1539:150b-20: sha dang khrag dang pags pa yin //
T02D1539:150b-21: ma las skyes par rab tu bshad //
T02D1539:150b-22: rnam pa gnyis la ril po gcig / gnyis byung las ni du ma'o //
T02D1539:150b-23: gcig dang du ma'i tshul las ni //
T02D1539:150b-24: rdo rje can du brjod pa yin //
T02D1539:150b-25: he ru ka sogs lnga yi ni //
T02D1539:150b-26: lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba //
T02D1539:150b-27: ji skad gsungs pa'i sgo bzhir ldan //
T02D1539:150b-28: rang gi yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02D1539:150b-29: ka ba brgyad kyis brtan pa yin //
T02D1539:150b-30: dngos grub kun du mnyam pas na //
T02D1539:150b-31: gru bzhi bar ni rab tu grags //
T02D1539:150b-32: sku gsung thugs kyi tshul gyis ni //
T02D1539:150b-33: gcig nyid 'khor lo gsum du brjod //
T02D1539:150b-34: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas ni //
T02D1539:150b-35: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal //
T02D1539:150b-36: bhee ram la sogs tshul bzhin gnas //
T02D1539:150b-37: mgo bo'i padma ri rab yin //
T02D1539:150b-38: rkang mthil gzhu yi dbyibs kyis ni //
T02D1539:150b-39: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal //
T02D1539:150b-40: gru gsum rked pa'i phyogs nyid na //
T02D1539:150b-41: me yi dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas //
T02D1539:150b-42: lto ba zlum po chu zhes brjod //
T02D1539:150b-43: snying ga gru bzhi sa zhes brjod //
T02D1539:150b-44: sgal tshigs ri rab lhun po'o //
T02D1539:150b-45: der ni mgo bo'i char gnas pa //
T02D1539:150b-46: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dam skyes la //
T02D1539:150b-47: dbyangs dang gsal byed yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1539:150b-48: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D1539:150b-49: mgo bo'i dbus nas glad pa zhes //
T02D1539:150b-50: bya bar grags pa de nyid ni //
T02D1539:150b-51: padma'i dbus gyur gang yin pa //
T02D1539:150b-52: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes byar brjod //
T02D1539:150b-53: de yi dbus na yi ge he //
T02D1539:150b-54: mi shigs thig le'i gzugs can te //
T02D1539:150b-55: mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1539:151a-0: sa bon gzugs kyis yang dag @151a * //
T02D1539:151a-2: de nyid brtan dang g-yor bcas pa'i //
T02D1539:151a-3: 'gro ba kun gyi rtsa ba ste //
T02D1539:151a-4: lus can kun gyi gzugs rnams kyi //
T02D1539:151a-5: dang por de las skyes pa yin //
T02D1539:151a-6: nyin mtshan bdud rtsi 'dzag pas na //
T02D1539:151a-7: me ni mnyes par byed pa ste //
T02D1539:151a-8: de nyid kyis ni sgra yang phyed //
T02D1539:151a-9: des ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs par //
T02D1539:151a-10: 'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1539:151a-11: de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes bshad de //
T02D1539:151a-12: dngos po rnams kyi snying po mchog / de ni len cing 'dzin pas na //
T02D1539:151a-14: rtsa rnams su ni yang dag 'jug / de yi sgo ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1539:151a-15: de dag 'dus pa'i dus su ni //
T02D1539:151a-16: lha yi lus su dmigs par 'gyur //
T02D1539:151a-17: steng 'og sgo ni rnam gnyis te //
T02D1539:151a-18: 'og sgor rnam par shes pa nyid //
T02D1539:151a-19: steng gi sgo ru khams rnams te //
T02D1539:151a-20: rnal 'byor pas ni rtsa rnams kun //
T02D1539:151a-22: lus la rtag tu steng sgor ni //
T02D1539:151a-23: rdo rje can ni rgyud du gnas //
T02D1539:151a-25: sgo dgu yis ni yang dag sgor //
T02D1539:151a-26: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis //
T02D1539:151a-27: rnam pa gsum du 'khrul pas na //
T02D1539:151a-28: mchog dang par dang tha ma yi //
T02D1539:151a-30: ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu ste //
T02D1539:151a-31: rags pa lnga ni lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1539:151a-32: bu ga dgu yi lam dag ni //
T02D1539:151a-33: sgo dgu zhes ni bya bar grags //
T02D1539:151a-34: tha ma lus kyi sgo yin te //
T02D1539:151a-35: sbom po'i lha ni rnam par sprul //
T02D1539:151a-36: gang gis 'di shes sems ldan zhing //
T02D1539:151a-37: skyes bu rnal 'byor pa zhes bya //
T02D1539:151a-38: dus rnams kun du rtag par ni //
T02D1539:151a-40: rkang med rkang gnyis bzhi sogs la //
T02D1539:151a-41: rlung la sogs pa'i bye brag gis //
T02D1539:151a-42: dbugs ni rnam pa bzhir gnas la //
T02D1539:151a-43: sems gnas pa yi cho gas gnyis //
T02D1539:151a-45: thim pa rtag tu gnas pa ste //
T02D1539:151a-47: de ltar gang gis mi shes pa //
T02D1539:151a-48: sems med skyes bu rnal 'byor min //
T02D1539:151a-49: me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni //
T02D1539:151a-50: dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu //
T02D1539:151a-52: steng dang logs dang thad kar sogs //
T02D1539:151a-53: gsum pa yid kyi sgo yin te //
T02D1539:151a-54: zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis //
T02D1539:151b-0: 'jug dang 'byung @151b ba'i sgo yi mchog / gtso bo steng dang 'og ces grags //
T02D1539:151b-1: 'og sgor rnam par shes pa ste //
T02D1539:151b-2: steng gi sgo ru khams rnams su //
T02D1539:151b-3: rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1539:151b-4: steng gi sgo nas bskyod nas su //
T02D1539:151b-5: de rnams 'og tu yang dag gnas //
T02D1539:151b-6: 'og tu spyan drangs steng gshegs gsol //
T02D1539:151b-7: spyan drang gshegs gsol tshul gyis ni //
T02D1539:151b-8: mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1539:151b-9: dus gsum sangs rgyas rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1539:151b-12: bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1539:151b-13: lhan cig skyes pas grub ste gnas //
T02D1539:151b-14: 'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1539:151b-15: tshogs 'di dag gis sems can rnams //
T02D1539:151b-16: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1539:151b-17: zla ba bcus ni sa rnams pas //
T02D1539:151b-18: sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug yin //
T02D1539:151b-19: snying gi dbus gyur padma ni //
T02D1539:151b-20: 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas //
T02D1539:151b-21: de yi dbus gyur dpa' bo ni //
T02D1539:151b-22: h'um gi sa bon mi shigs la //
T02D1539:151b-23: kha ba lta bu 'dzag pa ste //
T02D1539:151b-24: b'a santa zhes bshad pa yin //
T02D1539:151b-25: lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed //
T02D1539:151b-26: rgod ma'i kha ni me yi gzugs //
T02D1539:151b-27: bdag med ti la ka zhes brjod //
T02D1539:151b-28: lus kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su //
T02D1539:151b-31: bya ba dang ni byed pa'i dngos //
T02D1539:151b-32: 'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol //
T02D1539:151b-33: btsun mo'i bha ga bde can du //
T02D1539:151b-34: khu ba'i gzugs kyis yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1539:151b-35: de ma rtogs par bde ba med //
T02D1539:151b-36: bde ba spangs na'ang de mi dmigs //
T02D1539:151b-37: nus med ltos dang bcas pa'i phyir //
T02D1539:151b-38: lha yi sbyor bas bde ba'o //
T02D1539:151b-39: de phyir sangs rgyas dngos min zhing //
T02D1539:151b-40: dngos po med pa nyid kyang min //
T02D1539:151b-41: phyag dang zhabs sogs rnam spangs te //
T02D1539:151b-42: don dam bde ba gzugs yod min //
T02D1539:151b-43: des na 'gro kun lhan skyes dga' //
T02D1539:151b-44: lhan skyes zhes bya rnam par brjod //
T02D1539:151b-45: sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
T02D1539:151b-46: rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D1539:151b-47: dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pas //
T02D1539:151b-49: lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1539:151b-50: bskyed pa tsam du gnas pa yin //
T02D1539:151b-52: bstan pa bla na med pa yin //
T02D1539:151b-53: rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang //
T02D1539:152a-2: snying po len pas dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D1539:152a-3: de ni phyi nang sna tshogs kyi //
T02D1539:152a-4: khyab bya'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1539:152a-5: phyi ni gzugs dang sgra sogs pa //
T02D1539:152a-7: nang gi khu ba la sogs pa //
T02D1539:152a-8: sgrub pa'i rdzas su gnas pa ste //
T02D1539:152a-9: phyi dang nang gi de dag nyid //
T02D1539:152a-10: byang chub sems ni rdo rje can //
T02D1539:152a-11: sbom pa dang ni phra gzugs kyis //
T02D1539:152a-12: 'gro ba sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1539:152a-13: de ni sangs rgyas byang sems kyi //
T02D1539:152a-14: dam tshig don du gsungs pa ste //
T02D1539:152a-15: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni //
T02D1539:152a-16: thob pa'ang dkyil 'khor las byung ste //
T02D1539:152a-17: nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin du //
T02D1539:152a-18: tshangs sogs la yang dkyil 'khor skyes //
T02D1539:152a-20: dam tshig gcig pa'i spyod yul yin //
T02D1539:152a-21: 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba //
T02D1539:152a-22: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
T02D1539:152a-23: gtsub shing btsubs [?] pa'i sbyor de bzhin //
T02D1539:152a-24: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
T02D1539:152a-25: k'a li bung ba zhes bshad de //
T02D1539:152a-26: bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin //
T02D1539:152a-27: k'a li nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1539:152a-28: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1539:152a-29: rgyud dang rgyu yi gsang 'dzin pa'i //
T02D1539:152a-30: lus ni ma lus de las byung //
T02D1539:152a-31: phung po skye mched khams rnams dang //
T02D1539:152a-32: dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi dag / de dag kun las drangs nas su //
T02D1539:152a-33: rtsa ba dbus su thim par bya //
T02D1539:152a-34: 'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis ni //
T02D1539:152a-35: sbyor ba'i rdzas ni dbyung bar bya //
T02D1539:152a-36: ham ni char ba'i rgyun du brjod //
T02D1539:152a-37: dbyangs yig dang po'i sa bon ni //
T02D1539:152a-38: de yi dbus su gzung bar bya //
T02D1539:152a-39: k'a li me tog tshul du shes //
T02D1539:152a-40: rdo rje can gyi lus me tog /'khor ba bskyed pa ma yin zhing //
T02D1539:152a-41: thams cad kyi ni sa gzhi yin //
T02D1539:152a-42: ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir //
T02D1539:152a-43: shes rab chu srin nya la sogs //
T02D1539:152a-44: gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus nas ni //
T02D1539:152a-45: thabs kyi myu gu skyes pa yin //
T02D1539:152a-47: sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi'i gnas yin no //
T02D1539:152a-48: k'a li nyid kyang bdud rtsi ste //
T02D1539:152a-49: me tog chu ni 'dzin pa po //
T02D1539:152a-50: gnyis las skyes pa lus yin te //
T02D1539:152a-51: bdud rtsi chu yi cho ga mchog / dang po rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02D1539:152a-52: rnam pa ltar ni 'byung ba yin //
T02D1539:152a-53: reg na dro ba me yin te //
T02D1539:152a-54: du bar snang ba rlung yin no //
T02D1539:152b-0: zhu bar gyur na chu yin @152b te ;
T02D1539:152b-1: / gzugs su snang ba sa yin no //
T02D1539:152b-2: ye shes rdo rjes byin brlabs pa //
T02D1539:152b-3: rnam pa lngar ni rab tu skyes //
T02D1539:152b-4: sems can sangs rgyas nyid mod kyi //
T02D1539:152b-5: 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs //
T02D1539:152b-6: de spangs pa ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1539:152b-7: 'jig rten de nyid mi shes gang //
T02D1539:152b-8: dug zos pas ni brgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D1539:152b-9: de nyid shes pas spong 'gyur ltar //
T02D1539:152b-10: gti mug spang na mya ngan 'da' //
T02D1539:152b-11: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
T02D1539:152b-13: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
T02D1539:152b-14: dug gis dug ni sel bar 'gyur //
T02D1539:152b-15: ji ltar rlung nad ldan pa la //
T02D1539:152b-16: sran ma'i bza' ba sbyin par bya //
T02D1539:152b-17: bzlog pas sman du brtag par bya //
T02D1539:152b-18: srid pa srid pa nyid kyis sbyong //
T02D1539:152b-19: rnam rtog yang dag rtog spangs te //
T02D1539:152b-20: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa //
T02D1539:152b-22: de bzhin dngos por rtog pa yang //
T02D1539:152b-23: de yi tshul gyis dag par 'gyur //
T02D1539:152b-24: dper na me yis tshig pa dag / slar la me la bsro bar bya ;
T02D1539:152b-25: / de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa //
T02D1539:152b-26: 'dod chags me nyid bsten par bya //
T02D1539:152b-27: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
T02D1539:152b-28: gang dang gang gis bcings gyur pa //
T02D1539:152b-29: thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis //
T02D1539:152b-31: skye bo 'dod chags kyis bcings te //
T02D1539:152b-33: slar bzlog pa yi sgom pa yi //
T02D1539:152b-34: nang gi mu stegs can gyis min //
T02D1539:152b-35: mi shes rmongs pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D1539:152b-36: ji srid ye shes rnams spangs te //
T02D1539:152b-37: phyi rol dngos po la gnas shing //
T02D1539:152b-38: rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa'i tshe //
T02D1539:152b-39: bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi //
T02D1539:152b-40: phung po gnyis su brtags pa yin //
T02D1539:152b-41: chos ni rang bzhin rnam dag ste //
T02D1539:152b-42: skye ba med cing gnas med las //
T02D1539:152b-43: mi shes bsgribs pa'i skye bo la //
T02D1539:152b-44: sdig dang bsod nams sangs rgyas gsungs //
T02D1539:152b-45: drang ba'i thabs su mdzad pas na //
T02D1539:152b-46: sdig dang bsod nams gnyis ka yang //
T02D1539:152b-47: dper na chu yis gang ba'i klung //
T02D1539:152b-48: rgal 'dod skye bos shing drung ni //
T02D1539:152b-49: rtsva sogs bsdus te 'jus nas su //
T02D1539:152b-50: rgal te pha rol rgal ba dang //
T02D1539:152b-52: de bzhin chos dang chos min la //
T02D1539:152b-54: bde ba'i byang chub thob 'gyur nas //
T02D1539:152b-55: chos dang chos min rab tu spong //
T02D1539:153a-2: zab mo'i chos la 'jug par bya //
T02D1539:153a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lam //
T02D1539:153a-4: lam rig pa ni rtog mi 'gyur //
T02D1539:153a-5: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste //
T02D1539:153a-6: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
T02D1539:153a-7: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
T02D1539:153a-8: mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur //
T02D1539:153a-9: dbang po gnyis ni snyoms zhugs las //
T02D1539:153a-10: sku gsung thugs 'dus ye shes kyis //
T02D1539:153a-11: ye shes can ni tshe 'di la //
T02D1539:153a-12: nga rgyal gyis ni rnam pa kun //
T02D1539:153a-13: spangs nas rgyal ba'i gzugs rdzogs 'gyur //
T02D1539:153a-14: mi shes pa yi sprul pa yi //
T02D1539:153a-15: sna tshogs las las yang dag skyes //
T02D1539:153a-16: skyes pa bud med gzugs mi smad //
T02D1539:153a-17: sku yi rdo rje dam tshig yin //
T02D1539:153a-18: sems kyi rdo rje smad mi bya //
T02D1539:153a-19: ngon rtog dra bas bcings pa yi //
T02D1539:153a-20: sems can sna tshogs bskyab pa ni //
T02D1539:153a-21: thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin //
T02D1539:153a-22: brlang dang rtsub dang mi mnyan pa'i //
T02D1539:153a-23: tshig dag smra bar mi byed cing //
T02D1539:153a-24: mnyan na bde bar smra byed pa //
T02D1539:153a-25: gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin //
T02D1539:153a-26: ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang //
T02D1539:153a-27: chags pa'i gtam ni rnam pa du ma smra //
T02D1539:153a-28: de bzhin rnal 'byor lam ngan ston pa dang //
T02D1539:153a-29: lam yang ma bshad 'ching pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02D1539:153a-30: de nas gang gi tshe rig pa grub pa'i sgrub
T02D1539:153a-31: pa por gyur ba'i tshe rtags 'di dag 'byung ste
T02D1539:153a-32: // sa chen po g-yo zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grags pa dang //
T02D1539:153a-33: phyogs thams cad du 'od chen po bskal ba'i me lta bu 'byung ba dang //
T02D1539:153a-34: bdud kyi gnas rnams su cha lang lta bu'i sgra
T02D1539:153a-35: grags pas skar ma mda' gtong zhing rgya mtsho chen
T02D1539:153a-38: phyag rgya'i snying po can gyi ye shes kyi me
T02D1539:153a-39: 'bar bas bsgyings shing khams gsum po snang bar mdzad
T02D1539:153a-40: de // tshangs pa la sogs pa phyogs skyong chen po rnams dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1539:153a-41: mtsho sman la sogs pa dang /
T02D1539:153a-42: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams lhags te me
T02D1539:153a-43: tog dang rol mo sna tshogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis
T02D1539:153a-44: nam mkha' la gnas te mchod cing //
T02D1539:153a-45: mtsho sman dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams glu lan cing gar byed la /
T02D1539:153a-46: mi'am ci la sogs pa rnams dga' zhing rtse la rgyal bar gyur cig pa'i sgra 'byin to //
T02D1539:153a-47: lha rnams kyi legs pa'i sbyin pa dang /
T02D1539:153a-48: dga' ldan nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams
T02D1539:153b-0: gus par @153b phyag dang me tog gi char 'bebs
T02D1539:153b-1: so // mdor na sgrub pa po de la khams
T02D1539:153b-2: gsum na yod pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par
T02D1539:153b-3: so // byed do // rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa dang //
T02D1539:153b-4: gar yang mi 'gro gar mi gnas //
T02D1539:153b-5: thog ma dbus mtha' rnam par spangs //
T02D1539:153b-6: gnyis med srid gsum snang ba po //
T02D1539:153b-7: 'gro kun thams cad shes pa po //
T02D1539:153b-8: kun don kun gyi sems kun nas //
T02D1539:153b-9: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D1539:153b-10: yon tan kun gyis rgyan du byas //
T02D1539:153b-11: kun phan zhi ba mtshungs med pa //
T02D1539:153b-12: rtag 'char mgon skyob rnam rtog spangs //
T02D1539:153b-13: dbyibs dang kha dog las 'das pa //
T02D1539:153b-14: rgyal po rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin //
T02D1539:153b-15: bshig dka' bas na rdo rje ste //
T02D1539:153b-16: nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba yin //
T02D1539:153b-17: 'jigs pa med pas seng ge ste //
T02D1539:153b-18: 'jug par dka' bas rgya mtsho yin //
T02D1539:153b-19: de la sogs pa sna tshogs 'dus //
T02D1539:153b-21: rtog pa kun las rnam grol yang //
T02D1539:153b-22: de nyid gcig tu 'gro don mdzad//
T02D1539:153b-23: mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis ston //
T02D1539:153b-24: de ltar khyab par sna tshogs pas //
T02D1539:153b-25: rmi lam lta bur gar mdzad de //
T02D1539:153b-26: sgrub pas sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin //
T02D1539:153b-27: 'gro ba'i don ni rab tu mdzad //
T02D1539:153b-28: grub dang lung bstan ma thob kyang //
T02D1539:153b-29: rgyud dang bla ma'i man ngag la //
T02D1539:153b-30: brten nas gzhan la phan blos byas //
T02D1539:153b-31: 'di las bsod nams gang bsags pas //
T02D1539:153b-32: sa gsum skye bo ma lus pa //
T02D1539:153b-33: lam la rmongs pa dag gyur nas //
T02D1539:153b-34: rnal ma'i lam dang phrad gyur te //
T02D1539:153b-35: log lta skye bar ma gyur cig / bskal ba'i snyigs ma rtsod dus su //
T02D1539:153b-36: tshul chen rgya mtsho lta bur byung gyur yang //
T02D1539:153b-37: mig bral long ba rnams ni kha phyir bltas //
T02D1539:153b-38: de bas de la phan phyir brtsams pa yin //
T02D1539:153b-39: rnyed dang phrad par dga' bas skye bo rnams //
T02D1539:153b-40: dam pa brten la lam la 'bad pa gyis //
T02D1539:153b-41: dka' bas 'jug cing gzhan nas rtsol mi dgos //
T02D1539:153b-42: lhan cig skyes pas mtshon byas mtshon byed rnams //
T02D1539:153b-43: rang la gdod nas grub pa gnas pa yin ;
T02D1539:153b-44: / de nas mthun pa'i grogs dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1539:153b-45: ma yengs brtson pas goms par bya bar 'os //
T02D1539:153b-46: lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed
T02D1539:153b-47: pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na
